categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Kral was a male medic serving the Alliance to Restore the Republic, who was engaged to a female medic. During a four-day battle against Imperial forces, Kral was wounded in the stomach. Lying on a stretcher, he encountered his fiancée during a retreat; initially, she would not leave him until he pointed out that he could not walk, they could not spare the men to carry him, and that he had a painkiller with him to survive until the Empire picked him up. When the Imperial soldiers arrived, Kral used his painkiller; a grenade. It was effective.
